Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPointCollection>é usado em uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> para manter uma lista de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> objetos para corresponder.

Docs.summary: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe .

remarks.format: ## Remarks O construtor padrão inicializa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPointCollection> para uma lista vazia.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> points) cil managed

Docs.summary: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe usando uma lista de pontos de controle de atividade.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPointCollection> é inicializada para conter o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> objetos especificados em `points`.
